text: Okahola is an unincorporated community in Lamar County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== Ofahoma is a name derived from the Choctaw language, purported to mean either (sources vary) "scarce water" or "sounding water". ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Lamar County, Mississippi
title: Okahola, Mississippi
